entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 12:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
